job_description:
MonetizeMore builds industry-leading ad technology that is seen by more than 500M people per month. The company has been running for 11 years achieving consistent double-digit growth each year with a team of 180+ team members spread across the globe.

We are currently seeking to hire an experienced Senior Web Developer to join our Product Team.

Main Duties and Responsibilities

Plan, design, write, modify, integrate, and test web-related code in diverse environments, including Node.js, JavaScript, Python/Flask, PostgreSQL, Linux, Docker, Git, and Cloud Services.
Develop and maintain robust APIs and integrate with third-party APIs to automate manual tasks and streamline business processes.
Design and develop user interfaces for external reporting and internal business processes using modern front-end frameworks such as ReactJS, AngularJS, or Vue.js.
Actively participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and suggestions to enhance code quality, readability, and maintainability for fellow team members.
Conduct stress, load, and performance testing on web applications to evaluate system stability, scalability, and response times under various conditions, making necessary optimizations to guarantee optimal user experience and application reliability.
Participate in an Agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Mentor and support junior web developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning, collaboration, and growth within the team.

Skills Requirements

Education Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience

Work Experience Requirement: Must have at least 5 years of experience as a Web Developer using Flask, Django, Ruby on Rails or similar Python-based web framework; Must have at least 8 years of programming experience.

Skills Requirements:

Demonstrated work history and technical expertise in Python and JavaScript
Demonstrated work history and technical expertise in D-HTML, ReactJS, AngularJS or similar
Demonstrated work history and technical expertise on Linux platforms
Demonstrated work history and technical expertise with SQL, schema design, optimization and query analysis

As part of the screening process, candidates will be asked to participate in an online programming assessment through TestDome to demonstrate specific technical competency in relevant areas.

Job Details:

Job Title: Senior Web Developer

NOC Code: 2175

Terms of Employment: Full-Time, Permanent

Salary: $120,000 CAD/annum ($57.69/hourly equivalent)

Hours Per Week: 40 hours per week

Benefits Package:

2 weeks Paid Vacation per year
Health and Dental Benefits available after 90 days employment
Eligible to participate in Company Profit Sharing Program

Language of Work: English

Legal Business Name: eSell Solutions Ltd. DBA MonetizeMore

Business Address: 101 – 15317 Thrift Avenue, White Rock, BC, Canada V4B 2L4

Location of Work: Lower Mainland, British Columbia with Remote Work Available

Contact Information:

Telephone Number: (323) 315-0011

Email Address: hr.monetizemore@gmail.com

Mailing Address: 101 – 15317 Thrift Avenue, White Rock, BC, Canada V4B 2L4
